main.se450.factories

Class ShapeFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.se450.factories.ShapeFactory

  • public class ShapeFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory for creating Shape objects with given input parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IShape makeShape(java.lang.String type, float nLeft, float nTop, float nRight, float nBottom, float nX, float nY, float nRotation, java.awt.Color cColor, IStrategy iStrategy, ShapeSize sSize, int nScore, int nMultiplier, int nChildren)
      Make a new shape.
      static void moveShapeToBorderRandom(IShape iShape)
      Randomly move the shape to one border of the screen to make it appears from the border.

    • Method Detail

      • makeShape

        public static IShape makeShape(java.lang.String type,
                               float nLeft,
                               float nTop,
                               float nRight,
                               float nBottom,
                               float nX,
                               float nY,
                               float nRotation,
                               java.awt.Color cColor,
                               IStrategy iStrategy,
                               ShapeSize sSize,
                               int nScore,
                               int nMultiplier,
                               int nChildren)
                        throws BadShapeException,
                               UnsupportedShapeException
        Make a new shape.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the new shape
        nLeft - The minimum X coordinate of the new shape
        nTop - The minimum Y coordinate of the new shape
        nRight - The maximum X coordinate of the new shape
        nBottom - The maximum Y coordinate of the new shape
        nX - The speed in X direction of the new shape
        nY - The speed in Y direction of the new shape
        nRotation - The speed of rotation of the new shape
        cColor - The color of the new shape
        iStrategy - The border strategy of the new shape
        sSize - The ShapeSize of the new shape
        nScore - The base score value of the new shape
        nMultiplier - The multiplier value of the new shape
        nChildren - The number of children of the new shape
        Returns:
        the i shape A created IShape with given input parameters.
        Throws:
        BadShapeException - the bad shape exception
        UnsupportedShapeException - the unsupported shape exception

      • moveShapeToBorderRandom

        public static void moveShapeToBorderRandom(IShape iShape)
        Randomly move the shape to one border of the screen to make it appears from the border.
        Parameters:
        iShape - The IShape object that will be moved.
